subject: Golf
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The former Atlanta Braves pitcher John Smoltz struggled in his Nationwide Tour debut, shooting a 15-over 87 and missing the cut by 27 strokes at the South Georgia Classic in Valdosta.
snippet: The former Atlanta Braves pitcher John Smoltz struggled in his Nationwide Tour debut, shooting a 15-over 87 and missing the cut by 27 strokes at the South Georgia Classic in Valdosta.
